Name: Ancient: Legacy of Azul
About the game: You find yourself in a world plunged into chaos. Monsters roam this once peaceful land and will hunt down survivors without mercy. Discover shrines to bizarre forgotten gods which can lead to prosperity or annihilation. Even being the survivor that you are, you need not rely only on your agility and skill. Find everything from strange trinkets to powerful relics to give yourself the strength to overcome the obstacles before you. But, like you, your enemies will gain newfound strength through numerous mutations. Whether you fall and succumb to the horrors of the land or become triumphant, the fight will always go on… Features: A sidescrolling rogue-lite experience with fast paced combat Struggle against the mutations of your enemies and the world itself Unlock multiple characters with unique playstyles Discover and equip over 50 various items and power yourself up Learn of the world’s locations, characters, items, and mutations in your journal Items, mutations, and world layout are randomized so no two attempts are the same
